string-array.name: Manoa_Falls_Milestone
string-array.item:
MileStone 1 

 The gate to the trail will be near the message board. 

 Your start and return point will be here so backtracking will be needed. Take care to observe the posted messages and familiarize yourself with the signage.

MileStone 2 

 The second area to look for is in the wooden planks. This crosses over a stream. 

 Continue to follow the worn path to avoid injuries and erosion to other areas of the trail.

MileStone 3 

 Around a mile in, you should reach an area with a low branch overhanging the trail. In addition there will be plastic footings here to help with grip. The terrain after this point becomes muddier and elevates. 

 Continue on until you reach a large opening

MileStone 4 

 There will be an opening in the canopy with two paths. There are multiple ways to continue up but be sure to account for the mud here. The incline becomes very steep and may prove difficult on rainy days. 

 Walk until you reach the stone walls

MileStone 5 

 When reaching the stone walls, be sure to turn left. After this point the path begins narrow dramatically and with less oompact dirt. 

 Continue on until you reach a large staircase

MileStone 6 

 Approach these stairs with caution and be mindful of others. There are no handrails and can be slippery if damp. 

 Continue on until you see the waterfall

string-array.name: Makapuu_Lighthouse_Milestone
string-array.item: \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t MileStone 1 \n\n The entrance for this hike is marked clearly by some bollards after the end of the parking lot. Take care to read the posted signage and understand the safety warnings. There will be a smooth asphalt walkway that curves up to the 2nd milestone. Since the path is very clearly marked, do not go off the white lines to avoid eroding surroundings.

MileStone 2 

 The second milestone will have the lighthouse visibly around the corner. As you walk up there will be a fork in the road. Walk to the right to get to a vantage point. otherwise take the left or turn around to get to the start. 

 Continue until you reach the edge of the lookout

MileStone 3 

 The lighthouse will be below the cliff. Take the time to rest here. 

 Backtrack to the start of the hike on the same path taken earlier.
